text: This paper presents a pioneering investigation into the integration of artificial intelligence (AI) and computer vision algorithms for emotion detection in video content during user interactions. The study sets out to develop software capable of discerning human emotions by harnessing advanced AI algorithms and image processing techniques, particularly focusing on facial expression analysis. Through the utilization of convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and psychological theories of emotion, the research demonstrates promising results in emotion recognition. However, the study acknowledges the need for ongoing training and algorithm refinement, especially in contexts with diverse image datasets, to enhance precision and accuracy. The discussion emphasizes the transformative potential of AI-driven emotion detection technology while highlighting the importance of continuous learning and development to address challenges and optimize performance in real-world applications.
